Created an attachment (id=64660)
Fix

We should respect AUTOMATED_MODE flag in StatusNotificationManager

Tomek, please check this patch. I have no access to our test repository.
If tests pass, let me and Mike know on the bugzilla.
With your patch applied, I got all tests green here (except these two marked INVALID: bug 178212, bug 178214).
Ok, patch works then. It's ready for applying.
